2745538386.title: Client Biome Definition
2745538386.description: Contains a description and components to define a Client Biome.

description.description: Non-component settings, including the Client Biome name.

3567697697.title: Client Biome Components
3567697697.description: Any components that this Client Biome uses

minecraft:ambient_sounds.description: Set the ambient sounds for the biome. These sounds must be in the 'individual_named_sounds' in a 'sounds.json' file.

minecraft:atmosphere_identifier.description: Set the identifier used for atmospherics in Vibrant Visuals mode. Identifiers must resolve to identifiers in valid Atmospheric Scattering JSON schemas under the "atmospherics" directory. Biomes without this component will have default atmosphere settings.

minecraft:biome_music.description: Affect how music plays within the biome

minecraft:color_grading_identifier.description: Set the identifier used for color grading in Vibrant Visuals mode. Identifiers must resolve to identifiers in valid Color Grading JSON schemas under the "color_grading" directory. Biomes without this component will have default color_grading settings.

minecraft:dry_foliage_color.description: Set the dry foliage color used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default dry foliage color behavior.

minecraft:fog_appearance.description: Set the fog settings used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default fog settings.

minecraft:foliage_appearance.description: Set the foliage color or color map used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default foliage appearance.

minecraft:grass_appearance.description: Set the grass color or color map used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default grass appearance.

minecraft:lighting_identifier.description: Set the identifier used for lighting in Vibrant Visuals mode. Identifiers must resolve to identifiers in valid Lighting JSON schemas under the "lighting" directory. Biomes without this component will have default lighting settings.

minecraft:precipitation.description: Describes the visuals for a biome's precipitation. Biomes without this component will have default values. At most one precipitation type can be set for a biome.

minecraft:sky_color.description: Set the sky color used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default sky color behavior.

minecraft:water_appearance.description: Set the water surface color used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default water surface color behavior.

minecraft:water_identifier.description: Set the identifier used for rendering water in Vibrant Visuals mode. Identifiers must resolve to identifiers in valid Water JSON schemas under the "water" directory. Biomes without this component will have default water settings.

2544684648.title: minecraft:ambient_sounds
2544684648.description: Set the ambient sounds for the biome. These sounds must be in the 'individual_named_sounds' in a 'sounds.json' file.

addition.description: Named sound that occasionally plays at the listener position

loop.description: Named sound that loops while the listener position is inside the biome

mood.description: Named sound that rarely plays at a nearby air block position when the light level is low. Biomes without an ambient mood sound will use the 'ambient.cave' sound.

3762876268.title: minecraft:atmosphere_identifier
3762876268.description: Set the identifier used for atmospherics in Vibrant Visuals mode. Identifiers must resolve to identifiers in valid Atmospheric Scattering JSON schemas under the "atmospherics" directory. Biomes without this component will have default atmosphere settings.

atmosphere_identifier.description: Identifier of atmosphere definition to use

2571640896.title: minecraft:lighting_identifier
2571640896.description: Set the identifier used for lighting in Vibrant Visuals mode. Identifiers must resolve to identifiers in valid Lighting JSON schemas under the "lighting" directory. Biomes without this component will have default lighting settings.

lighting_identifier.description: Identifier of lighting definition to use

4043273229.title: minecraft:biome_music
4043273229.description: Affect how music plays within the biome

music_definition.description: Music to be played when inside this biome. If left off or not found the default music will be determined by the dimension. Empty string will result in no music.

volume_multiplier.description: Multiplier temporarily and gradually applied to music volume when within this biome. Must be a value between 0 and 1, inclusive.

1754577721.title: minecraft:grass_appearance
1754577721.description: Set the grass color or color map used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default grass appearance.

oneOf.description: Object specifying a color map for grass instead of a specific color.

grass_is_shaded.description: Adds a shading effect to the grass as if there was a roof.

2318322665.title: Grass Color Map
2318322665.description: Object specifying a color map for grass instead of a specific color.

color_map.title: Grass Colormap
color_map.description: Color map from textures/colormap to determine color of grass.

658145120.title: minecraft:sky_color
658145120.description: Set the sky color used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default sky color behavior.

3713296728.title: minecraft:foliage_appearance
3713296728.description: Set the foliage color or color map used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default foliage appearance.

color.description: RGB color of foliage, or a Foliage Color Map object.

oneOf.description: Object specifying a color map for foliage instead of a specific color.

969725495.title: Foliage Color Map
969725495.description: Object specifying a color map for foliage instead of a specific color.

color_map.title: Foliage Colormap
color_map.description: Color map from textures/colormap to determine color of foliage.

3904986305.title: minecraft:color_grading_identifier
3904986305.description: Set the identifier used for color grading in Vibrant Visuals mode. Identifiers must resolve to identifiers in valid Color Grading JSON schemas under the "color_grading" directory. Biomes without this component will have default color_grading settings.

color_grading_identifier.description: Identifier of color_grading definition to use

444653910.title: minecraft:dry_foliage_color
444653910.description: Set the dry foliage color used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default dry foliage color behavior.

783532490.title: minecraft:fog_appearance
783532490.description: Set the fog settings used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default fog settings.

fog_identifier.description: Identifier of fog definition to use

3830059653.title: minecraft:precipitation
3830059653.description: Describes the visuals for a biome's precipitation. Biomes without this component will have default values. At most one precipitation type can be set for a biome.

blue_spores.description: Density of blue spore precipitation visuals

red_spores.description: Density of blue spore precipitation visuals

white_ash.description: Density of white ash precipitation visuals

4061100221.title: minecraft:water_appearance
4061100221.description: Set the water surface color used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default water surface color behavior.

surface_color.description: RGB color of the water surface

surface_opacity.description: Opacity of the water surface (must be between 0 for invisible and 1 for opaque, inclusive)

2503601769.title: minecraft:water_identifier
2503601769.description: Set the identifier used for rendering water in Vibrant Visuals mode. Identifiers must resolve to identifiers in valid Water JSON schemas under the "water" directory. Biomes without this component will have default water settings.

water_identifier.description: Identifier of water definition to use

627767384.title: Client Biome Description
627767384.description: Contains non-component settings for a Client Biome.

identifier.description: The name of the Client Biome, used by other features like the '/locate biome' command. Must match the name of a Biome defined by the game or a behavior pack.

title: Client Biome JSON File
description: Contains a format version and a Client Biome definition

format_version.description: Version of the JSON schema used by this file

minecraft:client_biome.description: A single Client Biome definition, containing rendering or sound settings related to a Biome defined by the game or a behavior pack
